product_name: Outdoor Research Overtone Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Like a good buddy, the men's Overtone Long-Sleeve Shirt from Outdoor Research is there when you need it, whether you're hanging at the river with pals or hiking solo. 75% cotton/25% polyester fabric breathes and feels comfortable; wicks and dries more quickly than all-cotton shirts. Button front; 2 chest pockets; curved hem. Closeout.
short_description: Like a good buddy, the men's Overtone Long-Sleeve Shirt from Outdoor Research is there when you need it, whether you're hanging at the river with pals or hiking solo.
